episodes.title: Pharmacist Mark Foster Led Secret Voodoo Cult Murder
episodes.description:
The shocking true story of pharmacist Mark Foster who secretly led a voodoo cult in Minneapolis and orchestrated his own murder through follower Greg Friezner in a twisted religious ritual.

00:00:00 Pharmacist's Dark Secret Voodoo Sex Cult
00:05:07 Foster's Success and Spiritual Journey
00:09:52 Technology Fortune and Murder Plan
00:14:34 Greg Becomes Foster's First Disciple
00:19:15 Business Troubles and Sexual Religion
00:23:44 Company Collapse and Dark Magic
00:28:28 Black Magic and Death Threats
00:33:24 The Murder Plan for Immortality
00:38:30 The Execution and Failed Soul Transfer
00:43:27 Investigation Confession and Prison Sentences

episodes.title: Pharmacist Mark Foster's Bizarre Death Plan | Nothing Personal | FULL EPISODE | M.O: True Crime
episodes.description:
Explore the extraordinary tale of pharmacist Mark Foster, who orchestrates his own demise in a bizarre death plan. Uncover the secrets of his double life as a Voodoo sex cult leader, blending spirituality with unconventional beliefs. 

Nothing Personal - From Season 2 Episode 6: Explore Foster's journey through Santoria and Tantra, leading to a bizarre ritual that takes an unexpected turn.

Nothing Personal - Prepare to enter the world of the hired killer. Hosted and narrated by The Sopranos’ star Steve Schirripa, Nothing Personal: Murder for Hire is the gripping crime series that recounts the shocking true stories of cold-blooded contract killings. It’s a thrilling and ominous journey to the dark side as every episode tells the tale of a professional ‘hit’. From crimes of passion and greed to gangland executions and mafia contracts, the motives are always as colorful—and as chilling—as the cases themselves.

Discover the darkest mysteries and chilling criminal cases on M.O: True Crime. Unravel the truth behind notorious criminals and real-life investigations in a gripping exploration of intrigue and suspense.

Don't forget to subscribe to be a part of the discussions on chilling stories from around the world: https://bit.ly/44SrqgE
